detail_desc: Slightly elasticated metal bracelets.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with an intarsia motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Non-wired bra top in stretch fabric with a mesh racer back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seamless.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Playsuit in soft lace with flounces at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, and short legs. Jersey lining.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.

Short, lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a lined hood, high collar, and zip and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist, wide waist panel and open leg pockets.
Non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Gentle push-up.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.

Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with sections in contrasting fabric front and back. Long sleeves with wide ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Set with a bow tie and braces. Adjustable elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in patterned satin with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and rounded hem.

Zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Running vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details at the back.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Maxi dress in a lightly crêped weave with a sheen. V-neck front and back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Double-layered flutter sleeves that drape gently around the shoulders, and a gathered seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Lined.
Slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets and real back pockets.
V-neck T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Fitted top in glossy jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves with open sections and narrow cross-over straps.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs.
Baby Exclusive. Comfort blankets in an organic cotton waffle weave. Size 50x50 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a narrow trim around the neckline and flutter sleeves with overlocked edges.
Short shorts in woven fabric with side pockets and a high waist with wide elastic.
Long-sleeved top in patterned mesh with a small stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. The top is layered over a sewn-in jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width approx. 11.5 cm.
Dungaree shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with adjustable straps, an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Buttons at the sides, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Cold shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves. Double-layered flounce at the top and narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in organic cotton. Jersey bodysuit with buttons at the top, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Pattern-weave dungarees with pockets, straps that cross at the back with decorative buttons and fasten with buttons at the front, and elastication at the waist and hems. Lined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Oversized, V-neck jumper in a fine-knit mohair blend containing some merino wool. Long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide hem. Light support. Seamless.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Shoes in brogue-patterned imitation patent leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Terry linings and insoles.
Straight-cut coat in soft, stretch imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, detachable tie belt at the waist and no fasteners. Patch front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Playsuit in a cotton weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and a tie belt at the waist.

Dress in a viscose weave with short sleeves and a round neck with an opening and button at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist with decorative ties at the front, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Puff-sleeved T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Cotton canvas hi-tops with a padded edge, hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leather ankle boots with suede details, a zip at one side, an adjustable tab with a metal buckle at the other and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small embroidered text motif on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Empire-line dress in tulle embroidered with dangling sequins. Short, flutter sleeves and an opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck. Satin lining.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sturdy cotton piqué with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ribbed hems.

Ballet shoes in satin with a decorative bow at the front, elastic straps that cross over the foot and concealed elastication around the opening. Lining and patterned insoles in a cotton weave. Suede soles.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Skater skirt in stretch organic cotton jersey with visible elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and a double-layered hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves with ribbed sections at the elbows, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Warm-lined all-in-one suit in soft organic cotton jersey. Hood with sewn-on ears at the top. Concealed zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Mitts and feet that can be folded over to keep the hands and feet warm. Soft pile lining made from recycled polyester.

Longer-style blouse in lightly crinkled chiffon with a round, frill-trimmed neckline that is lower at the back with wide, horizontal ties. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, a gathered seam under the bust and a wide fit to the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Six pairs are decorated with glass rhinestones. Size from 0.2 to 2 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Tights in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with an elasticated waist.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), short, flounced sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Nightshirt in soft jersey with short sleeves and slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, a back pocket and knee-length legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Straight style in a relaxed fit.

Top in soft slub cotton jersey with hole embroidery at the front, a button placket and a gathered seam at the top. Long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Fitted dress in glittery jersey with a V-neck, decorative, gathered seam at the front and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.

Cropped track jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams. Stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a rubber tab for a good grip. Long raglan sleeves and concealed elastication at the hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Imitation leather belt with two rows of metal eyelets and a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in a soft organic cotton blend.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs with plastic details. Length 2 cm, 2.5 cm and 6.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
